subject: From: FAMOUS AGOBA BLESSING
body:
From: FAMOUS AGOBA BLESSING <cj604558@gmail.com>
Date: Tue, Jun 4, 2019,
Subject: From The Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC).
To: 
Attention Beneficiary.    
 
I am  DR CARLSON JAMES  Jr, the new Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC)  nominated by President of the United State  to replace the previous director Dr.Adam J. Szubin. due to internal logical protocols guiding international and local transactions, my tenure represent peace, equity and justice and rule of law shall prevail, my duty is to ensure global maximum security and to protect fundamental human rights
The Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) is an agency of the United States Department of the Treasury under the auspices of the Under Secretary of the Treasury for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence. OFAC administers and enforces economic and trade sanctions based on U.S. foreign policy and national security goals against targeted foreign states, organizations, and individuals.
My name is DR CARLSON JAMES   and I am the Director of OFAC. Because of the economic problem in  Ghana I travel from United States of America to  Ghana yesterday. Today I went to see the President of Ghana to look for a way to stop the economic problem in Ghana and also I went to Banks and Security Company in Ghana and find out that you have $800,000.00  Billion U.S Dollars also 260 boxes  in Ghana. 
Before we can allow the fund to be transfer OR delivery to you in your States ,you must obtain (NON-AFRICA FUND OWNERSHIP APPROVED PERMIT DOCUMENT) and it will cost you $ 320 usd only.
I wait for your respond.
The Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC).

subject: Re:   From: FAMOUS AGOBA BLESSING
body:
Dear Dr. Carlson James Jr.,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am, however, a bit confused about the details of this situation. Could you please clarify what exactly is required from my side? 

You mentioned something about a "FUND OWNERSHIP APPROVED PERMIT DOCUMENT" that I need to obtain. Could you please provide more details about this document and why it is necessary? Also, how can I go about obtaining it?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ann
